site.tagline: A clean landing structure for studios and client work.
site.description: A neutral landing template for agencies: clear sections, editable copy, and a small Tailwind-based component set.
site.gradient: radial-gradient(circle at 15% 0%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.22), transparent 55%), radial-gradient(circle at 90% 20%, rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.16), transparent 45%)

seo.title: Agency Landing — Landing starter
seo.description: A clean landing structure for studios and client work.

fonts.sans: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji"
fonts.mono: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, "Liberation Mono", "Courier New", monospace

hero.headline: A calm landing page you can ship to clients.
hero.subheadline: Config-driven sections with neutral copy. Swap the text, replace assets, and keep the layout consistent across projects.

socialProof.title: Clients (placeholder)
socialProof.note: Replace with real client logos/names — or disable this section.

features.title: Capabilities and scope
features.description: Use this section for what you do and what you don’t do — keep it concrete.

items.title: Config-first editing
items.description: Update site identity and links in `src/config/site.ts`.

items.title: Clear sections
items.description: Each section is a component with an `enabled` flag in `src/config/content.ts`.

items.title: Accessibility-aware
items.description: Semantic HTML, focus-visible styles, and reduced motion support.

items.title: No big UI framework
items.description: Tailwind-based components you can copy, delete, or refine.

howItWorks.title: A repeatable handoff
howItWorks.description: Start from a preset, then refine copy and links per client.

steps.title: Pick a preset
steps.description: Use `npm run preset -- agency` to start from this layout.

steps.title: Replace placeholders
steps.description: Swap social proof and testimonials with real references.

steps.title: Ship a static build
steps.description: Build once, deploy anywhere with `npm run build`.

testimonials.title: What clients say (placeholder)
testimonials.description: Use real quotes, keep them short, and link to work where possible.
